thread.title: Could Sphero's lifelike BB-8 be the best Star Wars toy yet? Watch Droid unboxed, tested and drooled over
thread.title_full: Could Sphero's lifelike BB-8 be the best Star Wars toy yet? Watch Droid unboxed, tested and drooled over

author: Danny Walker
title: Could Sphero's lifelike BB-8 be the best Star Wars toy yet? Watch Droid unboxed, tested and drooled over
text:
Watch Next 
Could BB-8 be the Droid the you’re looking for? 
As Star Wars: The Force Awakens gears up to takeover cinemas this December - now with its earlier date - toy makers and retailers are preparing a rebel assault on your funds. 
Cleverly linking up with the franchise they've released some Jedi-like tricks of their own. 
On Friday 4th September - better known as Force Friday - the latest Star Wars goodies, gizmos and must-own memorabilia was unleashed to the galaxy and Sphero’s BB-8 was clearly one of the standout products. 
Sphero BB-8 launches 
Arriving in a haze of mystery the pint-sized ball of fun was very reminiscent of the Droid we’d been ogling in the trailers.
